Quiz.question:
1 Part III: Interpreting the Findings Select the correct option, and click the Submit button. What is the level of severity for this risk? Based on the following information, answer each question regarding the risk to a worker for a 1-hour exposure:
  • The estimated concentration of Methylene Chloride is between 7-22 ppm
  • The tasks in the maintenance shop are performed with no hazard controls.
  • You can assume a medium confidence in characterization.
    • You have 2 questions left. Negligible Moderate High 1
